verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> of every one of them a rod <S%H4294><s%> <S%H4294><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, of all their princes <S%H5387><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> rods <S%H4294><s%>: write <S%H3789><s%> thou every man's <S%H376><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> upon his rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> upon the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>: for one <S%H259><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> shall be for the head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.
And thou shalt lay them up <S%H3240><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you.

And it shall come to pass, that the man's <S%H376><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%>, whom I shall choose <S%H977><s%>, shall blossom <S%H6524><s%>: and I will make to cease <S%H7918><s%> from me the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whereby they murmur <S%H3885><s%> against you.

¶ And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and every one of their princes <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him a rod <S%H4294><s%> <S%H4294><s%> apiece, for each prince <S%H5387><s%> <S%H5387><s%> one <S%H259><s%> <S%H259><s%>, according to their fathers' <S%H1><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, even twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> rods <S%H4294><s%>: and the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> was among <S%H8432><s%> their rods <S%H4294><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> laid up <S%H3240><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness <S%H5715><s%>.

And it came to pass, that on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of witness <S%H5715><s%>; and, behold, the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> was budded <S%H6524><s%>, and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> buds <S%H6525><s%>, and bloomed <S%H6692><s%> blossoms <S%H6731><s%>, and yielded <S%H1580><s%> almonds <S%H8247><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> all the rods <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and they looked <S%H7200><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%>.

¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Bring <S%H7725><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for a token <S%H226><s%> against the rebels <S%H4805><s%> <S%H1121><s%>; and thou shalt quite take away <S%H3615><s%> their murmurings <S%H8519><s%> from me, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so: as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so did <S%H6213><s%> he.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold, we die <S%H1478><s%>, we perish <S%H6><s%>, we all perish <S%H6><s%>.
Whosoever cometh any thing near <S%H7131><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>: shall we be consumed <S%H8552><s%> with dying <S%H1478><s%>?
